rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: Minimalist entryway leading into an open-plan living area with ample natural light from east-facing windows, ensuring Vastu compliance. The space is designed to facilitate positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen and Dining
rooms.description: A compact, functional kitchen adjoining a dining area. The kitchen is located in the south section for fire element balance, following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with a private balcony to the north for relaxation and fresh air, ensuring Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom for the second occupant. Placed on the west side to balance energies.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A bedroom designed with a focus on tranquility and balance, integrating Vastu by positioning it in the east quadrant.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: A versatile bedroom for additional family or guest use, aligned in the south quadrant to complement other energy zones.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: A modest living space for the staff. Located towards the periphery of the ground floor to maintain privacy and operational efficiency.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A minimalist archway leading into the entrance hall, designed with clear lines and symmetry.

openings.name: East-Facing Window
openings.description: Large windows in the east wall to invite morning sunlight for enhanced positivity as per Vastu.

openings.name: South-Facing Window
openings.description: Strategically placed openings on the south wall to balance the fire element in kitchen and dining areas.

openings.name: North-Facing Window
openings.description: Window for the master bedroom balcony ensuring a clear view of the morning sunrise, aligning with Vastu principles.

openings.name: West-Facing Window
openings.description: Window placement in Bedroom 2 to harmonize energies and provide balanced ventilation.

rooms.name: Second-Level Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan space designed for relaxation and informal gatherings, featuring a minimalist aesthetic with east-facing windows.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom suite providing extra space for the family or guests, positioned in the west quadrant to maintain energy balance.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A modern bathroom with sufficient natural light and ventilation, ensuring comfort and Vastu compliance.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A centrally located staircase connecting the ground and first floor, designed with safety and minimalist aesthetics in mind.

openings.name: East-Facing Window
openings.description: Large windows on the east side to allow morning sunlight into the living area.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A spacious and serene terrace offering panoramic views, designed for relaxation with a minimalist layout. Equipped with retractable shades to maintain privacy.

openings.name: Terrace Access
openings.description: A secure, well-designed access to the rooftop terrace from the upper floor.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool
rooms.description: An irregularly shaped swimming pool integrated into the design, providing a luxurious recreational space while adhering to minimalistic aesthetics and ensuring proper drainage.

openings.name: Pool Deck
openings.description: A deck area surrounding the pool to provide access and relaxation space, designed in accordance with Vastu for water element balance.
